official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide for an investment option under the Thrift Savings Plan that does not include investment in any fossil fuel companies.
short_title: Retirement Investments for a Sustainable Economy Act of 2018
subjects: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

summary.text:
Retirement Investments for a Sustainable Economy Act of 2018 or the RISE Act of 2018

This bill establishes a new fund—the Climate Choice Stock Index Fund—as an investment option under the Thrift Savings Plan.

The Climate Choice Stock Index Fund must be invested in a portfolio that is designed to replicate the performance of a commonly recognized index comprised of common stock and to ensure that no investment in the portfolio is an investment in a fossil fuel entity.
